query: INSERT INTO AnimalTemperaments (animalId, temperamentId, createdAt, updatedAt) SELECT a.id, t.id, NOW(), NOW() FROM Animals a CROSS JOIN Temperaments t WHERE (a.name = 'Coco' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Species s WHERE s.id = a.speciesId AND s.name = 'Dwarf Hamster') AND t.name IN ('calm', 'scared')) OR (a.name = 'Ted' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'scared')) OR (a.name = 'Coco' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM Species s WHERE s.id = a.speciesId AND s.name = 'Jack-Russel') AND t.name = 'energetic') OR (a.name = 'Everest' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'happy')) OR (a.name = 'Rocko' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'lazy')) OR (a.name = 'Goldy' AND t.name = 'calm') OR (a.name = 'Lizzy' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'lazy')) OR (a.name = 'Goga' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'lazy', 'scared')) OR (a.name = 'Tweet Tweet' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'happy')) OR (a.name = 'Toothless' AND t.name = 'scared') OR (a.name = 'Sophie' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'scared')) OR (a.name = 'Teddy' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'scared')) OR (a.name = 'Roger' AND t.name IN ('calm', 'happy')) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updatedAt = VALUES(updatedAt);
